title: Mercy
description: Sixteen-year-old Julian spent his entire life in a rundown apartment with a neglectful mother and drunken grandmother, always hoping he would one day discover the identity of his father. Determined to find the truth, his search for paternal roots leads him to multi-millionaire, Anthony Luciano. Once accepted into the Luciano family, Julian decides to use his newfound wealth and power to get back at an enemy in his old neighborhood. When his plan for retaliation causes more damage than Julian could have ever imagined, father and son must work together to protect the family, and bring a cold-blooded killer to justice.
author: Dana K. Ray
